<Classes will be conducted through a combination of face-to-face sessions, Zoom sessions and on-demand lessons - Google Classroom code: kjp7rcz>

This course will be conducted through short lectures, seminars, discussion groups and group reading sessions. A strong emphasis will be placed on pair and group work.

(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Classes will be broadcast through a combination of PowerPoint presentations with audio and data recorded from face-to-face-classes. Materials
will be shared through Google Classroom.
